page.title: 20The Towndweller Part 2
page.content: On Monday morning the office is filled with people and all five phones are busy receiving information for the weekly edition.He regularly travels abroad linking up stories with the history of both military and dockyard aspects of the town,as well as being sponsored by travel firms to report on the pleasures of continental holidays. The Western Telegraph itself has been improved by new technology,it is now completely computerised with a more attractive layout and much clearer photographs. To sum up the business of a reporter he gave us this quote,"The job of a good reporter is to keep his finger on the pulse or heartbeat of the town and very little passes without his or her knowledge. "
